title: This isn't Zoe...
body:
https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ztsIKkbGflI/W05dXqQmiuI/AAAAAAABDVs/DA52ycBh9OYkkQ-OTjci-uAXykzMoqSTgCEwYBhgL/s1600/a8abe745df5b121f.jpg

this is zoe

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-z2979SkqWvY/W05QyvyX0II/AAAAAAABDO8/dQZAK053NWc527fOB4y319ULKCbBalz8ACLcBGAs/s200/3584.jpg

this is not zoe.



(sorry to say but these two look nothing alike)

replies.body: I'm not seeing the difference besides a slight color change, but that could be because of lighting.

> [{quoted}](name=Jamaree,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=L0xzREfk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-17T23:28:51.519+0000)
>
> I'm not seeing the difference besides a slight color change, but that could be because of lighting.

eyes are swapped. flower is swapped. facial features are different and skin tone is different.

> [{quoted}](name=BLACK REALM GOD,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=L0xzREfk,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2018-07-17T23:32:21.332+0000)
>
> eyes are swapped. flower is swapped. facial features are different and skin tone is different.

agreed. i even saw some people on twitter confused. even if its just a mirrored image, it still doesnt scream "zoe" to me.

> [{quoted}](name=BLACK REALM GOD,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=L0xzREfk,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2018-07-17T23:32:21.332+0000)
>
> eyes are swapped. flower is swapped. facial features are different and skin tone is different.

Didn't notice the eyes or flower, though thought the skin tone was because of lighting.

The splash art is actually the one with incorrect eyes/flower.  I don't get why this happens so frequently that splash arts are "mirrored" like this.  The last one I'm aware of was Lunar Empress Lux, who also had an icon where she was correct.

Anyway, I think the mouth is the biggest problem.  The top lip is much more convex in the icon than in the splash.  The eyes also look sort of doll-like with how wide they are.  Other than that, her features are pretty much the same, though.

> [{quoted}](name=Larriet,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=L0xzREfk,comment-id=000000020003,timestamp=2018-07-18T05:36:40.543+0000)
>
> The splash art is actually the one with incorrect eyes/flower.  I don't get why this happens so frequently that splash arts are "mirrored" like this.  The last one I'm aware of was Lunar Empress Lux, who also had an icon where she was correct.
> 
> Anyway, I think the mouth is the biggest problem.  The top lip is much more convex in the icon than in the splash.  The eyes also look sort of doll-like with how wide they are.  Other than that, her features are pretty much the same, though.

well you know... they dont use the same artists for splashes and icons. i guess that kinda goes without saying.
Yeah, I don't personally have an issue with it, just trying to point those things out since they didn't really go into what details actually look different, just "facial features".
The icon got the eyes and flower right,the splash art is the one that swapped the positions.

> [{quoted}](name=GreenLore,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=L0xzREfk,comment-id=000000020002,timestamp=2018-07-17T23:40:02.350+0000)
>
> The icon got the eyes and flower right,the splash art is the one that swapped the positions.

meh... it might be that the icon is a reflection in the water of the pool.

as far as the eyes on pool party zoe go it doesnt matter if purple or green is on the right so long as everything that has to do with the skin is in synch.

> [{quoted}](name=Jamaree,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=L0xzREfk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-17T23:28:51.519+0000)
>
> I'm not seeing the difference besides a slight color change, but that could be because of lighting.

zoes character is bubbly and fun and cute. the icon strips her of all her personality in my opinion. also as you mentioned the lighting and colors are diff and there are gonna be people who have the skin bg as their profile page and this as their icon. i love everything about the skin. I just think the icon's expression and color scheme need to be rethought out

> [{quoted}](name=PoppyStar,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=L0xzREfk,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-07-17T23:31:28.181+0000)
>
> zoes character is bubbly and fun and cute. the icon strips her of all her personality in my opinion. also as you mentioned the lighting and colors are diff and there are gonna be people who have the skin bg as their profile page and this as their icon. i love everything about the skin. I just think the icon's expression and color scheme need to be rethought out

I personally don't see that, but to each their own.
Unless the icon is in a mirror's perspective, and if I know how mirrors work, but I'm sure I don't, the pink and green eyes are switched and the flower is on the wrong side.
The icon actually got the eye colors and the flower right,the splash art is the one that is flipped(which honestly isn't very uncommon)
Its Myisha, you heard it here first.

> [{quoted}](name=Ebonmaw Dragon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=L0xzREfk,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-07-18T00:12:28.906+0000)
>
> Its Myisha, you heard it here first.

thinking emoij

To be honest, none of them looks like Zoe. Her previous splashes are so high quality that it is impossible to compare them. Yes i Like the colors and playfulness but her face is messed up in both of them. In the splash she looks like and alien (probably cause the eyes are miles away from each other) , while in the icon she looks mad at life :)))

Of course that's not Pool Party Zoe.

It's Pool Party Myisha.
just flip it and it's Zoe?
